reviews.review_text: I tried chicken fry , Appam and Parotta and would rate them around 3.5 /5 as many mallus recommended this place I had alot of expectations the flavour/ punch of spices was missing and my friends had some beef fry and beef masala they said it's good so you can give a try and there are very less veg options

Ordered through Swiggy for guests (bill att).
Will not deny. Taste is good.
however, the items received were wrong. moreover Item recived was beef. Thankfully, It was realized before we served the guests who do not consume the same. still made for a very uncomfortable environment.
Raised a grievence through through the app, and they connected us on a conference call. the person from the hotel decided to hang up mid conversation. A very sad response.
Pls check on what you send to your customers pls!

Mallu Republic is my go-to spot at Talegao for an authentic Malabar breakfast or a quick Swiggy lunch. Their appam and Kerala parotta are my absolute favorites, always soft and perfectly made. I can't resist most of the food, the rich flavors of curry leaves in their tawa fry bangad Or the Kerala chicken fry, absolutely yummy!  Their biryani is also a standout! Every dish brings the taste of Kerala right to my table, making it a must-try for anyone craving genuine, flavorful Malabar cuisine. When at Malli Republic don't forget to try the lemon tea!
